name: Mistakes Made, then Repeated Infinitely
description:
Fight against your own mistakes as your past-selves follow you around and loop endlessly, getting in your way as you try to put all of the gems into their colored slots.

This is my entry for the Mini Jam 111 Game Jam: https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-111-colors

The theme was: Colors

The limitation was: You Are Your Own Enemy

The jam itself lasts for 72 hours (though I didn't join in until Saturday morning, so my timer says it took only about 30 continuous hours to make within the 72).

Controls are explained in the tutorial, but they are as follows: Jump: Z key or A button; Sword: X key or B button; Menu: enter key or Y button
